meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7405.

div.div:
2016 Teen Tournament semifinal game 3.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: Apurva Kanneganti, a senior from Germantown, Tennessee
Antonio Karides, a junior from Severna Park, Maryland
Michael Borecki, a junior from Darien, Connecticut

tr.td: IN BETWEEN
SOUTHERN HISTORY
BUSINESS
CONTEMPORARY AUTHORS
CHARACTERS IN TV SHOWS
"PEANUT", "BUTTER", "JELLY", "TIME"
